So Chad owes: $8851960.11. The answer is: 8851960.11.

subanswer.text: Chad's burrito costs 8,412,734.21 dollars without considering the gift card. After deducting the $5.00 gift card, he needs to pay 8,412,734.21 - 5 = 8,412,729.21 dollars. The answer is 8,412,729.21.
